extension.news: [add] Python 3 compat. [add] Settings -> Maintenance -> Delete temporary files [add] Settings -> General -> Rate video after watching [add] Settings -> API -> Enable API configuration page - when enabled, visit http://ipaddress:port/api to configure API keys from a web browser - port is configured in Settings - HTTP Server - Port [add] Storing personal api keys in api_keys.json, restore keys from json on settings loss [add] Storing login tokens in access_manager.json, restore tokens from json on settings loss [add] youtube_registration module, register developer keys and use them by appending an addon_id=:addon_id parameter to youtube add-on plugin urls [add] screensaver=true parameter to /play route - no suggested videos, no post play events, don't ask for quality [fix] Signature deciphering [fix] context menu after playback [fix] alternative player, do not append headers [fix/upd] post play events happen post play [fix/upd] set title from metadata on play [upd] Dutch strings [MB1968] [upd] French strings [bubuleur] [upd] Greek strings [twilight0]
extension.description: YouTube is one of the biggest video-sharing websites of the world.
extension.disclaimer: This plugin is not endorsed by Google
extension.description: YouTube הוא אחד מאתרי שיתוף הווידאו הגדולים בעולם.
YouTube ist eines der größten Video-Sharing-Websites der Welt.
YouTube jest jednym z największych na świecie serwisów udostępniania wideo.
A YouTube világ egyik legnagyobb videómegosztó weboldala.
YouTube es uno de los mayores sitios web de intercambio de vídeos del mundo.
Данное дополнение позволяет находить и смотреть видео на всеми любимом сайте.
YouTube est l'un des plus grands sites de partage vidéos du monde.
「Youtube」是全世界最大的影片分享網站
YouTube е един от най-големите уеб сайтове за споделяне на видео в целия свят.
Το YouTube είναι μία από τις μεγαλύτερες ιστοσελίδες διαμοιρασμού βίντεο στον κόσμο.
extension.disclaimer: Η παρούσα μικροεφαρμογή δεν έχει υϊοθετηθεί από την Google
extension.description: YouTube er en av verdens største nettsider for videodeling.
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 2, June 1991

extension.description: Play videos of different ad-financed sports streaming sites.
נגן סרטונים של אתרי ספורט שונים הממומנים על ידי מודעות.
extension.disclaimer: SportsDevil does not provide any streams of its own; stream quality, content and copyright are responsibility of the ad-financed source web site. For updates - check the readme.
SportsDevil אינו מספק שום הזרמה; איכות הזרם, התוכן וזכויות היוצרים הם באחריות אתר האינטרנט הממומן על ידי המודעה. לעדכונים בדוק את קובץ readme
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 2, June 1991

extension.summary: Scrape common video host for URL's to be playable in XBMC/Kodi.
extension.description: Scrape common video host for URL's to be playable in XBMC/Kodi, simplifying addon development of video plugins requiring multi video hosts.

extension.summary: Resolve common live video host URL's to be playable in XBMC/Kodi + find links embeded in sites.
Resolve common video host URL's to be playable in XBMC/Kodi.
Resolver enlaces a videos de sitios populares para poder reproducirlos en XBMC/Kodi.
Prilagodi najčešće URL-ove video izvora kako bi radili u XBMC/Kodiju.
extension.description: Resolve common video host URL's to be playable in XBMC/Kodi, simplify addon development of video plugins requiring multi video hosts.
Prilagodi najčešće URL-ove video izvora kako bi radili u XBMC/Kodiju, pojednostavnjuje razvoj priključaka za video dodatke koji zahtjevaju višestruke video izvore.

extension.summary: Resolve common video host URL's to be playable in XBMC/Kodi.
Resolver enlaces a videos de sitios populares para poder reproducirlos en XBMC/Kodi.
Prilagodi najčešće URL-ove video izvora kako bi radili u XBMC/Kodiju.
extension.description: Resolve common video host URL's to be playable in XBMC/Kodi, simplify addon development of video plugins requiring multi video hosts.
Prilagodi najčešće URL-ove video izvora kako bi radili u XBMC/Kodiju, pojednostavnjuje razvoj priključaka za video dodatke koji zahtjevaju višestruke video izvore.
Provides plugin URL routing and pattern matching
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 3, 29 June 2007

extension.summary: Livestreamer extracts streams from various services
extension.description: Livestreamer is a command-line utility that pipes video streams from various services into a video player, such as VLC. The main purpose of Livestreamer is to allow the user to avoid buggy and CPU heavy flash plugins but still be able to enjoy various streamed content. There is also an API available for developers who want access to the video stream data.

Plexus - Any complex structure containing an intricate network of parts. Plexus brings native peer-to-peer support (AceStream and SopCast) for Kodi Entertainment Center for several platforms.[CR][CR]Documentation: (missing)

Plexus - Uma estrutura complexa constituída por uma rede de partes. O Plexus adiciona suporte peer-to-peer nativo (AceStream e Sopcast) ao Kodi Entertainment Center para várias plataformas.[CR][CR]Documentação: (em falta)

Plexus - Una estructura compleja conteniendo una intrincada red de partes. Plexus añade soporte nativo peer-to-peer (AceStream y SopCast) al Centro de Entretenimiento Kodi para varias plataformas.[CR][CR]Documentacion: (falta)
extension.disclaimer: The author does not host nor distribute any of the content you may watch using this addon. The author has no part in the development of any included technologies. When seeking help in Kodi's forum please respect rules (http://kodi.wiki/view/Forum_rules).

Os autores não alojam nem distribuem nenhum do conteúdo que poderá ser reproduzido a partir deste addon. Os autores não têm qualquer parte no desenvolvimento de qualquer uma das tecnologias. Se procurar ajuda no fórum oficial do Kodi por favor respeite as regras do fórum (http://kodi.wiki/view/Forum_rules).

El autor no aloja ni distribuye cualquier contenido que ud. pudiera reproducir usando este addon. El autor no tiene participacion en el desarrollo de cualquier tecnologia incluida. Cuando requiera ayuda en el foro de Kodi por favor respete las reglas (http://kodi.wiki/view/Forum_rules).
